articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets Swedish Ambassador
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets Swedish Ambassador
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, chairman of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly who is member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a talk with new Swedish Ambassador to the DPRK Jonas Michael Wendel on Monday when the latter paid a courtesy call on him.
					 Present there were officials of the WPK Central Committee and a member of the Swedish embassy.

articles.title: Korea-Europe Association Spokesman Blasts Remarks of UK Secretary of State for Defense
articles.content:
Korea-Europe Association Spokesman Blasts Remarks of UK Secretary of State for Defense
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korea-Europe Association made public the following press statement on Monday:
					 On September 29, at the welcoming ceremony for the NATO secretary general held in a British nuclear submarine base in Scotland, the British secretary of State for Defense uttered a reckless remark that the British government is working together with the U.S. administration to end the nuclear program of the DPRK while claiming that their nuclear deterrence protects the U.K. from north Korea and Russia.
					
					 His reckless remark is an unsound claim to find an impertinent fake excuse to justify their pursuit of nuclear weapons modernization.
					
					 Although the U.K. dispatched its soldiers to the Korean War siding with the U.S. in the last century, we have clarified on several occasions that we do not consider the U.K. as our enemy since our two countries established official state relations in the new century.
					
					 However, recently some British politicians are saying that the possibility of British involvement cannot be ruled out in case an armed conflict takes place on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK is watching their moves carefully with due vigilance.
					
					 Moreover, the secretary of State for Defense pigheadedly branded the DPRK's nuclear deterrence as a threat to the U.K. and even dared to impugn the dignity of our supreme leadership. This is an act that can never be tolerated.
					
					 To remind them once more, the DPRK's measures to strengthen the nuclear force are, for all intents and purposes, an exercise of its right to self-defense to safeguard peace and security in the Korean peninsula and the region from the vicious anti-DPRK hostile policy and nuclear threat of the U.S. which aim at obliterating the DPRK's sovereignty and rights to existence and development and annihilating the DPRK itself.
					
					 Whoever it is, getting recklessly involved in the confrontation between the DPRK that possesses the powerful nuclear deterrence in practice and the U.S. is a foolish act tantamount to jumping into the fire with fuel.
					
					 The U.K. would better get rid of its forlorn hope of eliminating, in collaboration with the U.S., the nuclear deterrence of the DPRK that now possesses even H-bomb and ICBM and address the DPRK-related issues from a strategic perspective.
					
					 The secretary of State for Defense should contemplate his words and behavior, rather than persistently ignoring the cause of the evil and dancing to the tune of the U.S.

articles.title: No Force Can Check Advance of DPRK: CCNR
articles.content:
No Force Can Check Advance of DPRK: CCNR
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the Consultative Council for National Reconciliation in a statement Monday said Trump and his group are going on the rampage, lost to reason, being taken aback by the strong retaliatory will of the army and people of the DPRK.
					 Trump put into force the executive order, while ramping up sanctions against the DPRK, and is spouting such rubbish that "north Korea won't be around much longer", "military option will be very destructive" and "he will set right the north issue spoiled by the predecessors".
					
					 Not content with calling for regular deployment of nuclear strategic assets on the Korean peninsula together with the south Korean puppet forces, the U.S. is staging a combined infiltration drill to irritate the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. frantic moves are a revelation of the feelings of defeat, shame and weakness of the U.S. unable to check the dynamic advance of the DPRK toward the final goal of perfecting the nuclear force of the state, and also an expression of uneasiness and horror about its imminent tragic end, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 All facts prove that the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is, in essence, a policy for massacring the Koreans aimed to ignite a nuclear war on this land at any cost and exterminate all living things on the land.
					
					 The bat-blind men, who can never understand from where the invincible might of socialist Korea and the tremendous vitality of the Korean people stem, are trying to threaten others by brandishing rot sanctions stick and letting out rubbish. But this is a ridiculous act.
					
					 Steadfast is the determination and will of the army and people of the DPRK to bring about the final victory without fail in do-or-die battle for hastening the final ruin of the U.S. imperialists and in the battle for national reunification with the dignity and honor of Juche Korea.
					
					 No force on the earth can check the DPRK advancing with the might of self-reliance, upholding the banner of simultaneously developing the two fronts under the guidance of the great party.

articles.title: Photo Show Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as WPK General Secretary
articles.content:
Photo Show Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as WPK General Secretary
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition opened with due ceremony at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Displayed in the venue of the event is the picture of Kim Jong Il wishing Juche Korea a happy future with a broad smile on his face.
					
					 On display there are photos showing Kim Jong Il's feats for party building.
					
					 There are also photos of Kim Jong Il in the days when he provided his revolutionary leadership for establishing a thorough ideological and leadership system of the leader in all sectors of the revolution and construction.
					
					 Other photos deal with the feats he performed by successfully accomplishing the cause of immortalizing President Kim Il Sung with the noblest moral obligation.
					
					 Some photos tell about the patriotic devotion made by him to firmly defend socialism, standing in the forefront of revolution, and to lay an eternal foundation for the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people.
					
					 Also displayed are photos of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 And there are photos showing the stirring reality of the country which is demonstrating its dignity and might as a politico-ideological power and the world's military power with nuclear weapons and growing stronger day by day under the guidance of the Party.
					
					 Attending the opening ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee, Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture, and officials concerned and Pyongyangites.

articles.title: DPRK Championships Open
articles.content:
DPRK Championships Open
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The DPRK championships opened with due ceremony at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street here on Monday.
					 The championships are to be held at stadiums and gymnasiums in Pyongyang and Phyongsong, Sariwon and other local areas. The players will compete in more than 470 categories of 37 events including football, basketball, volleyball, judo, boxing, track and field and figure skating.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK who is chairman of the National Sports Guidance Committee, Vice-Premier Jon Kwang Ho, officials concerned, sportspersons and working citizens.
					
					 Minister of Physical Culture and Sports Kim Il Guk said in the opening address that the championships would mark a significant occasion in glorifying the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the development of the country's sports and displaying the unwavering faith and will of the Korean people and sportspersons to build a highly civilized socialist nation under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un despite the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces' unprecedented obstructive moves.

articles.title: Exhibition of Sports Sci-Tech Achievements Opened
articles.content:
Exhibition of Sports Sci-Tech Achievements Opened
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The 21st National Exhibition of Sports Scientific and Technological Achievements opened with due ceremony at the Sci-Tech Complex on Monday.
					 On display at the exhibition are more than 1 200 sci-tech achievements such as sports programs, measuring instruments, sports medicine, tonics, athletic equipment and sports goods and books and papers.
					
					 Among those present at the ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK who is chairman of the National Sports Guidance Committee, Jon Kwang Ho, vice premier of the Cabinet, and officials concerned.
					
					 Kim Il Guk, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, stressed in an opening address that through the exhibition, all the participants should actively exchange their successes and experience and apply them in practice and thus furtherimprove every sphere of sports such as exercise and competition, sports education and training of sports reserves on the basis of modern sports science.
					
					 The exhibition will remain open till September 6.

articles.title: Russian Party Delegation Here
articles.content:
Russian Party Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia led by Morozov Anton Yurevich, member of the Supreme Council and member of the Committee for International Affairs of the Party, arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: Group of Koreans in Japan Leaves
articles.content:
Group of Koreans in Japan Leaves
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- A home-visiting group of Koreans in Japan led by Ri Chi Ung left here on Monday.

articles.title: Battery Alternating-current Car Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Battery Alternating-current Car Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- A new type of battery AC tramcars began running at the Tukjang Area Coal-Mining Complex in the DPRK to be conducive to boosting coal production.
					 The new battery AC tramcar is more than 1.3 times higher than the existing DC tramcar in haulage and is very flexible in starting, braking and regulating speed.
					
					 And it is very fast to recharge its batteries.
					
					 In this regard, Jon Jong Su, an official of the Ministry of Coal Industry, told KCNA that a series of sci-tech achievements have been made one after another to give impetus to the development of coal industry, despite of the heinous sanctions put by the U.S. imperialists and other hostile forces upon the DPRK and their provocation against it.

articles.title: Anti-U.S. Sentiment Grows Stronger among DPRK People
articles.content:
Anti-U.S. Sentiment Grows Stronger among DPRK People
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The will to take revenge upon the U.S. imperialists by exterminating them on the earth grows stronger among the DPRK people as the days go by.
					 In a matter of six days alone after the publication of the statement of the chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission, more than 4.7 millions of people from all walks of life petitioned to be allowed to join or rejoin the Korean People's Army. And the number of petitioners is on the daily increase.
					
					 Pak Tong Jon, a war veteran living in Sinhung-dong No. 2, Tongdaewon District, Pyongyang, told KCNA:
					
					 We can never pardon old living dead Trump for letting loose reckless remarks of totally destroying the DPRK.
					
					 As long as there exist on the earth Yankees who have inflicted only misfortunes and sufferings upon the Korean people and are running amuck to hurt the DPRK, it is impossible for us to live in peace.
					
					 Though I am aged, I am full of militant spirit to take the arms in my hand again to mercilessly punish the enemies keen debasing our dignity, if the moment of decisive battle avails itself.
					
					 Choe In Chol, chief engineer of the Pyongyang Steel Works, said:
					
					 All the officials and workers of my works volunteered for service in the army.
					
					 Old bastard Trump is so mad enough to make reckless remarks of "totally destroying" the DPRK on the UN arena.
					
					 No matter how desperately the aggressors run amuck, they can never block the advance of our people who have turned out in the struggle for genuine life with the firm belief in the validity of our cause.
					
					 If the enemies dared provoke a war, we will surely wipe them off the map and put a victorious end to the decades-long anti-U.S. confrontation.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on Japanese Gov't Authorities' Moves to Stifle DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on Japanese Gov't Authorities' Moves to Stifle DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Prime Minister Abe, the chief cabinet secretary, the foreign minister and other government authorities of Japan are now getting hell-bent on the anti-DPRK moves.
					 At the recent UN General Assembly Abe said that "pressure, not dialogue, is needed" over the issue of the DPRK while running around the UN stage like a headless chicken to meet leaders of different countries so as to incite "solidarity of the international community".
					
					 In particular, Foreign Minister Kono who assumed office not long ago had telephone talks with the foreign ministers of UNSC member states and toured Middle East countries to beg for cooperation in pressurizing the DPRK, only inviting derision of the world.
					
					 The Japanese politicians left no stone unturned to clamor about "maximum pressure" on the DPRK, through so-called speech, appearance on TV, summit, telephone talks and other occasions, irrespective of object and place. Their behavior is little short of mad rackets.
					
					 The true nature of the Japanese reactionaries using the "theory of crisis on the Korean peninsula" and "fiction of threat from the north" for political purpose has already been exposed to the international community.
					
					 The sanctions and pressure rackets Japan keeps up joining the U.S. in its moves to stile the DPRK are aimed to ceaselessly strain the situation on the peninsula under the pretext of the latter's counteraction.
					
					 Japan thinks that it can without difficulty attain its political aims when "security crisis" goes into gear.
					
					 The "security crisis" based on the situation of the peninsula is just a "problem" that has to be invented as it helps calm down the strong domestic and international protest against the revision of constitution, facilitate Japan's militarization and at the same time strengthen inside unity and save the present rulers driven into a tight corner with corruption and irregularities, economic difficulty, etc.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have already revised the law on punishing organized crimes and drastically increased defense cost and dissolved the House of Representatives in the wake of cabinet reshuffle for early elections. This is part of efforts for sinister political goal.
					
					 Nevertheless, it's too early to wear a complacent smile.
					
					 As a Korean saying goes, sorrow is laugher's daughter.
					
					 Japan's such rackets inciting the tension of the Korean peninsula is a suicidal deed that will bring nuclear clouds to the Japanese archipelago.
					
					 No one knows when the touch-and-go situation will lead to a nuclear war, but if so, the Japanese archipelago will be engulfed in flames in a moment. This is too self-evident.
					
					 If the Japanese people, the first victim of nuclear disaster in the world, are offered in sacrifice owing to handful militarist reactionaries' political aim, it will be a tragedy of the century.
					
					 The Japanese politicians should stop acting rashly in an attempt to derive a benefit from the tense situation on the Korean peninsula and had better think twice about the consequences.

articles.title: S. Korea-U.S. "Mutual Defense Treaty" Must Be Scrapped: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korea-U.S. "Mutual Defense Treaty" Must Be Scrapped: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday carries an article on the lapse of 64 years since the U.S. prodded the south Korean puppet regime into signing the "mutual defense treaty."
					 The U.S., seized with the invariable wild ambition for dominating the Korean peninsula and the rest of the Northeast Asian region, cooked up the offending treaty in league with the puppet regime under the pretext of tackling the "threat of southward invasion" on Oct. 1, 1953 right after it was defeated in the Korean war, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. has justified its forces' presence in south Korea under the pretext of that treaty, turned south Korea into an advanced base for a nuclear war against the DPRK, disturbed the Korean nation's reconciliation, unity and reunification and inflicted untold misfortune and pain upon south Koreans.
					
					 The "treaty" was a product of the U.S. belligerent scenario to provoke a new war on the Korean peninsula and a criminal one to justify the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces' presence in south Korea, undermine the unity of the Korean nation and disturb the improvement of the north-south ties and independent reunification, wantonly violating the dignity and rights of the south Korean people.
					
					 The impact of the "treaty" on the efforts of the Korean nation for carving out its destiny independently is so negative that it has no reason to exist.
					
					 It is an urgent requirement of the situation to scrap the "treaty."
					
					 All Koreans in the north, the south and abroad should wage a fiercer nation-wide struggle to get the "treaty" scrapped at once and the U.S. imperialist aggressor troops withdrawn from south Korea and to accomplish the cause of nation reunification.

articles.title: DPRK Will Win Victory in Final Battle with U.S.: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Win Victory in Final Battle with U.S.: Rodong Sinmun 
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The service personnel and people of the DPRK will give full play to the pent-up wrath and fury and biggest power to annihilate the U.S. imperialists and achieve the historic cause of national reunification without fail, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Everyone believes that the DPRK is sure to win victory in the all-out death-defying struggle against the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK has the single-minded unity more powerful than nuclear weapons, the most powerful striking means developed by itself and the Juche-oriented war methods beyond imagination.
					
					 Our final death-defying battle is a sacred war of justice to root out the source of a war on this land and bring about durable peace. 
					
					 The U.S. is the dirtiest cesspool in the world that no one feels sorry for its elimination and the source of crimes that deserves total destruction. 
					
					 The DPRK has already been in full readiness. All striking means are on the alert. All our service persons and people have turned out in the retaliatory war of justice.
					
					 Once the Korean-style striking battle prepared for centuries for a final battle with brigandish U.S. imperialists starts, this will be the most dreadful and horrible retaliatory war and continue till there is no one left to sign a surrender document and to cry out and till the U.S. imperialists are removed from this planet.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces will pay a price for their disgusting action and crimes. Not content with praising Trump's reckless remarks denounced by the whole world as an "address efficient enough to change the north," they claim that they "feel stronger friendship" with wolf-like Trump who is going reckless to destroy fellow countrymen in the north.

articles.title: Equilibrium of Force Is Realistic Way for Defending Peace: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Equilibrium of Force Is Realistic Way for Defending Peace: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday stresses in an article that imbalance of force was created in many regions of the world and it has become a factor of spawning domination, interference and war.
					 Saying the world history of wars is a history in which the powerful dominationist states invaded weak countries, the article goes on:
					
					 Therefore, a weak country can not defend its sovereignty and dignity and its people's security.
					
					 The imperialists and dominationists dare not to ignite a war against those countries with equal force because the war may cause their own ruin.
					
					 That's why a war does not break out among nuclear weapons states.
					
					 If the DPRK had not opted for access to nuclear weapons against the U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail in time, the Korean Peninsula would have been turned into a theatre of war again.
					
					 The DPRK's final goal is to ensure the equilibrium of force with the U.S. so that the latter's chief executives can not dare to talk about military option against the former.
					
					 Nuclear deterrent of the DPRK provided by dint of self-reliance and self-development is growing stronger with passage of time, exerting great influence on the balance of force in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 The wicked design of the U.S. to occupy the DPRK and grasp the vast region of Eurasia with the Korean Peninsula as a springboard is being frustrated by the DPRK's powerful nuclear deterrence.
					
					 Its force does never work on the DPRK. This is proved by the present reality.
					
					 The world will clearly see how the DPRK destroys the tyrannical nukes and defends peace.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Hit for Anti-DPRK Confrontation Racket
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Hit for Anti-DPRK Confrontation Racket
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet foreign minister oft-repeated her rubbish calling for "dealing a telling blow to the north" through full implementation of the "sanctions resolution" during the recent UN General Assembly. She even cried out for pressurizing "the north's regime to change its path." In this context, the chief executive of south Korea, who returned home from the U.S., chaired a "plenary meeting of the security council." There he discussed the plan for "deterring additional provocation," asserting that there might be a "toughest provocation by the north." And the puppet forces call for "intensified joint defence posture", crying out for the deployment of U.S. strategic nuclear assets in the Korean peninsula and the purchase of latest arms and equipment.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Monday says:
					
					 The above-said behavior is just an act of treachery betraying the true colors of the faithful dog and war executor of the U.S. and a hideous provocation to the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership like the American old gangster.
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime's servile move is just a foolish act of precipitating its self-destruction.
					
					 In case a war breaks out in the Korean peninsula, south Korea will come under the barrage of fire beyond imagination.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities persist in zealously joining the Trump cult in its anti-DPRK moves, defying our repeated warnings, they will have to pay dearly for it.
					
					 They had better zip their lips if they don't want to meet the miserable end.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Condemned as Top Class Criminal
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Condemned as Top Class Criminal
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that traitor Lee Myung Bak told the Intelligence Service to mislead public opinion related to the "National Assembly" election in the year 2012, his tenure of office, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 According to a document revealed by the "National Assembly", Chongwadae ordered the Intelligence Service to make an all-out effort to build up a public opinion favorable to the regime a month before the "National Assembly" election.
					
					 Lee must be tried for his crimes against history and the nation.

articles.title: S. Korea: Rights of Trade Unions Demanded
articles.content:
S. Korea: Rights of Trade Unions Demanded
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online newspaper Jaju Sibo, the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a news conference outside Chongwadae on September 28, demanding the rights of trade unions.
					 In a press release, the Confederation said that guarantee of the trade unions' rights, the revision of labor law and the conversion of part-time jobs into full-time jobs are tasks for turning the south Korean society into that of respect for labor.
					
					 It urged the authorities to ensure the three rights of part-time workers to labor, make them full-time workers, repeal the decisions on punishing labor activists and outlawing the teachers union and the government employees' union and take steps to reinstate discharged workers in the public service sector and stop the long-time labor.

articles.title: War Moves against DPRK Denounced
articles.content:
War Moves against DPRK Denounced
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Organizations of different circles in south Korea reportedly had a rally in Thapgol Park of Seoul on September 28 to denounce the U.S. and south Korean puppet authorities' war moves against the DPRK.
					 Speakers at the rally charged that Trump is continuing threat and blackmail, asserting that all preparations have been completed for war on the Korean peninsula, and tightening the sanctions against the sovereign state with "presidential executive order" and domestic law.
					
					 Saying it was proven by the U.S. deeds why the Korean peninsula has been exposed to the permanent danger of war, they called for turning out in the anti-U.S., anti-war struggle for peace and reunification.

articles.title: Deployment of American Strategic Assets Rejected in S. Korea
articles.content:
Deployment of American Strategic Assets Rejected in S. Korea
Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Minjok Ilbo on September 29 posted an editorial rejecting the scheme of the U.S. imperialists and the puppet authorities to deploy American strategic assets in south Korea for invasion of the north.
					The editorial said that a plan for deploying F-22s, F-35Bs and B-1B and other strategic assets is under discussion and, in particular, the authorities asserted that they should include a nuclear submarine.
					
					It stressed that the present "government" should withdraw the plan and take to the road of national cooperation.

articles.title: S. Korea: Military Authorities Slashed for Cyber Attack on Civic Bodies
articles.content:
S. Korea: Military Authorities Slashed for Cyber Attack on Civic Bodies
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society in south Korea reportedly made public a statement on Sept. 28 to condemn the puppet army's cyber command for cyber attack on civic bodies.
					 The statement noted that the cyber command had cooked up and spread misinformation slandering the Solidarity and many civilians during the Lee Myung Bak regime.
					
					 Psychological warfare is evidently a military action and an illegal act against the basis of democracy, it stated, urging a strict investigation into the military authorities' wrongdoings against civic organizations and civilians and punishment of those responsible for them.

articles.title: S. Korean Expeditionary Group Goes on Hunger Strike in U.S.
articles.content:
S. Korean Expeditionary Group Goes on Hunger Strike in U.S.
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The People's Democratic Party of south Korea reportedly formed an expeditionary group for peace and went on a hunger strike outside the White House from September 27. 
					 The hunger strikers bitterly denounced the nonsensical remarks of rabid Trump.
					
					 In its commentary on Sept. 28, the group charged that Trump and the White House are driving the situation of the Korean peninsula to the brink of a war.
					
					 It urged the U.S. to withdraw its troops and THAAD from south Korea, roll back the declaration of war and start peace negotiation with the DPRK at once.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Meet
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Meet
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Officials of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and its organizations and enterprises and those in Kanto area held a meeting at the Central Hall of Chongryon on Sept. 28 denouncing  old lunatic of America Trump who let out such remarks as "totally destroying" the DPRK.
					 Present were Chairman Ho Jong Man and vice-chairpersons of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, and other Chongryon officials, officials of its organizations and enterprises, those in Kanto area and others. 
					
					 A statement of the chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK was read out.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 Speakers said that the historic statement solemnly issued by respected Marshal Kim Jong Un is a stern declaration of merciless destruction to outrageous U.S. imperialist aggressors and a declaration of his resolute will to bring about the final victory in the showdown with the U.S. at an early date. 
					
					 They called for settling accounts with the crimes U.S. imperialists committed against the Korean people while keeping up nuclear blackmail and threat for more than half a century.
					
					 They vowed to turn out in the confrontation with the U.S. as befitting overseas citizens of the DPRK and consolidate the single-minded unity of the ranks of Chongryon in any storm and stress.

articles.title: Korean Youth and Students in Japan Slams Trump's Assertion
articles.content:
Korean Youth and Students in Japan Slams Trump's Assertion
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- A protest group of Korean youth and students in Japan on Sept. 27 staged a protest action outside the U.S. embassy in Tokyo over the fact that Trump insulted the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and made such rubbish as "totally destroying" the DPRK.
					 When the Japanese police mobilized armored vehicles and riot policemen to block the road to the embassy, they broke through police cordon with individual action and advanced up to the embassy. 
					
					 They shouted slogans denouncing the U.S. anti-DPRK policy and nuclear war moves, adding to the atmosphere of the struggle.
					
					 The head of the group read out a protest letter toward the U.S. embassy.
					
					 The letter bitterly condemned rabid old man Trump for spitting out such remarks as "totally destroying" the DPRK and the Korean people.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Launch Actions to Defend National Education
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Launch Actions to Defend National Education
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The "Let us defend our school! University students' action" started under the sponsorship of the Union of Korean Students in Japan with due rally in Tokyo on Sept. 24.
					 Present at the rally were Kim Hyon Il, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Students in Japan, officials and members of the union, compatriots and Japanese students and personages.
					
					 Prior to the rally a video on the April 24 struggle for education of Koreans in Japan against the Japanese authorities' moves to obliterate national education in 1948 was screened.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 Speakers disclosed the essence of the Japanese authorities' discrimination against Korean schools and denounced its injustice. 
					
					 They declared they would intensify information and legal activities through internet and other means and vigorously push ahead with the action to defend national education as those participants in the April 24 struggle for education did.
					
					 Japanese personages denounced the Tokyo District Court for its recent decision dismissing the demand of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and Koreans in Japan for application of tuition-free program for senior high schools to Korean schools, declaring their will to wage active struggle of solidarity to protect the Korean students' right to learning in the future.
					
					 Representatives of all headquarters of the union expressed their resolve to struggle until the problem aiding Korean schools is settled.
					
					 Through the action to be held till Dec. 15, the Union of Korean Students in Japan is going to widely inform Japanese society of the justice of national education and injustice of discrimination against Korean schools, build public opinion against the discrimination and launch the struggle for application of the tuition free program to Korean schools and resumption of payment of subsidies to them and protest against the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan in different parts of Japan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Austrian Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Austrian Website
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK posted on its website respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Cause of the Great Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Is Ever-Victorious" on the occasion of the 72nd founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The work, published on October 4, Juche 104 (2015), clarifies that the seven decades-long history of the WPK is the one of victory which demonstrated the validity and invincibility of the cause of the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. It also says that the cause of the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is invincible.

articles.title: U.S. President's Rubbish Slammed
articles.content:
U.S. President's Rubbish Slammed 
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Bodies of the Czech Republic and Russia issued statements on Sept. 23 and 25 to denounce Trump for talking about "totally destroying" the DPRK.
					 The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association said:
					
					 The international community is expressing serious concern and contempt for the imperialist dictator as he, president of the U.S. styling itself as "a democratic country", has attacked and threatened other countries.
					
					 Trump's violent remarks were full of malice toward the DPRK successfully speeding up socialist construction while beefing up its military muscle to defend the state and social system from the U.S. military threat.
					
					 Trump said he would "totally destroying" the DPRK. This is an unforgivable provocation against an independent state.
					
					 Wherever American soldiers went, a war broke out without fail.
					
					 But the DPRK's huge military muscle will bring to naught the aggressive policy of the U.S. trying to dominate the Korean peninsula and the whole world.
					
					 The Rostov Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia, the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Arkhangelsk Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy of Russia said that Trump again revealed the U.S. nature of aggression in the UN arena.
					
					 The bodies appealed to progressive mankind to struggle against the U.S. interference in sovereign states' internal affairs, noting that the situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula has again proved that the road chosen by the Korean people was right.

articles.title: Foreign Figures Warn U.S. against Being Insolent
articles.content:
Foreign Figures Warn U.S. against Being Insolent
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Personages of South Africa and Ethiopia made statements on Sept. 25 and 26 denouncing the rubbish of the U.S. chief executive over the DPRK.
					 Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party and chairman of the South African Association of Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People, condemned the U.S. chief executive for his unprecedented remarks such as "totally destroying" the DPRK in the UN arena.
					
					 He branded Trump as a rude war maniac who failed to be qualified for a president and to acquire normal thinking ability.
					
					 He said that as long as Trump stays in office, bloody war will only spawn on this planet.
					
					 He expressed the belief that the Korean army and people would win the final victory in the standoff with the U.S. imperialists, rallied close around Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Nigatu Dagnachew, chairman of the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, said that the president representing a country trumpeted about total destruction of a sovereign state in the world's largest official diplomatic arena, which was unprecedented in the history of the UN. 
					
					 He noted that as long as Trump stays in office, the world can hardly live in peace.
					
					 He pointed out that Trump has no knowledge of the DPRK.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The DPRK is a nuclear power as it has access to nuclear weapons and ICBM by its own energy and technology in the face of the harsh sanctions. It is also a country where all the people are single-mindedly united around their leader.
					
					 Trump had better know this fact.
					
					 The U.S. should stop being insolent and stand face to face with the DPRK with prudence.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong se reune con Jonas Mikael Wendel
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong se reune con Jonas Mikael Wendel
Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ACNC) -- Ri Su Yong, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente de la Comision de Relaciones Exteriores de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, converso el dia 2 con el nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario del Reino de Suecia en Corea, Jonas Mikael Wendel, quien le hizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: El vocero de la Asociacion Corea-Europa condena los disparates del secretario de Estado para la Defensa de Gran Bretana
articles.content:
El vocero de la Asociacion Corea-Europa condena los disparates del secretario de Estado para la Defensa de Gran Bretana
Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ACNC) -- El portavoz de la Asociacion Corea-Europa hizo publica el dia 2 una declaracion siguiente:
					Segun trascendidos, en la ceremonia celebrada el 29 de septiembre para dar bienvenida al secretario general de la OTAN quien visito una base de submarinos nucleares de Gran Bretana enclavada en Escocia, el secretario de Estado para la Defensa de Gran Bretana dijo que el disuasivo nuclear de Gran Bretana protege a su pais desde el Norte de Corea y Rusia y su pais se esfuerza junto con la administracion norteamericana por acabar con el programa nuclear de la RPDC.
					
					Estos disparates del ministro britanico devienen el intento malsano para buscar persistentemente en otro el pretexto para la modernizacion de sus armas nucleares.
					
					En el siglo pasado Gran Bretana envio sus tropas a la guerra coreana poniendose al lado de EE.UU. Pero, la RPDC aclaro reiteradamente que no considera a ese pais europeo como enemigo puesto que ambos paises establecieran oficialmente las relaciones estatales en el siglo nuevo.
					
					A pesar de esto, unos politicos britanicos hablan de que no excluyen la posibilidad de la intervencion de su pais si estalle el conflicto militar en la Peninsula Coreana. La RPDC esta observandolo con la debida vigilancia.
					
					En particular, el secretario de Estado para la Defensa de Gran Bretana insistio obstinadamente en que nuestro disuasivo nuclear constituye una amenaza a su pais y atendio hasta nuestra maxima dignidad, lo cual deviene un acto imperdonable.
					
					A decir otra vez, nuestras medidas tomadas para incrementar las fuerzas armadas nucleares son el ejercicio del derecho a autodefensa para salvaguardar la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region desde la politica hostil y el chantaje nuclear de EE.UU. que intenta violar la soberania y los derechos a la subsistencia y al desarrollo de la RPDC y destruirla finalmente.
					
					Deviene un acto suicida si se mete, sea quien fuera, en la confrontacion entre EE.UU. y la RPDC que se dispuso realmente del poderoso disuasivo nuclear. 
					
					Seria bueno que Gran Bretana nos trate con la vision estrategica liberandose de la vana ilusion de eliminar en cooperacion con EE.UU. el disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC que cuenta hasta con la bomba H y el ICBM.
					
					El secretario de Estado para la Defensa britanico debe hablar y actuar con prudencia en vez de bailar al son que le toca EE.UU., haciendo vista gorda de la causa del mal.

articles.title: Portavoz de CRN condena conducta imprudente de Trump y sus compinches
articles.content:
Portavoz de CRN condena conducta imprudente de Trump y sus compinches
Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que Trump y sus lacayos se portan con mas imprudencia espantados ante la declaracion de venganza implacable del ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC, el portavoz del Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional publico el dia 2 una declaracion que sigue:
					  A pesar de nuestra severa advertencia, Trump puso en practica la orden ejecutiva de intensificar las sanciones anti-RPDC y pronuncia en estos dias los disparates tales como el "Norte no resistira largo tiempo", "el proyecto militar sera muy destructivo" y "corregira el problema norcoreano que echaron a perder los antecesores".
					
					  Insatisfecho de abogar con los titeres surcoreanos por el emplazamiento periodico de las propiedades estrategicas nucleares en la Peninsula Coreana, actua ridiculamente para amenazar a alguien desarrollando el entrenamiento conjunto de infiltracion en nuestra retaguardia.
					
					  Esta locura de EE.UU. deviene una expresion de la frustracion, la verguenza y la incapacidad de quien no puede impedir por nada el avance vigoroso de la RPDC hacia la meta de completar las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado.
					
					Igualmente, significa el gesto de inquietud y pavor por el acercamiento del fin tragico.
					
					Todos los hechos demuestran que la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU. es la de masacre de una nacion encaminada a exterminar todos los organismos vivos de esta tierra al provocar a toda costa la guerra nuclear.
					
					Es muy ridiculo que esos imbeciles, quienes no pueden conocer donde esta la fuente de la fuerza invencible de la Corea socialista y de la vitalidad inagotable del pueblo coreano, traten de amenazar a alguien esgrimiendo el desgastado garrote de sancion y diciendo disparates violentos.
					
					Son firmes la decision y voluntad del ejercito y pueblo coreanos de lograr sin falta, por la dignidad y el honor de la Corea del Juche, la victoria final en la lucha general por el arruinamiento definitivo del imperialismo yanqui y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					No hay en este mundo el que pueda detener a la RPDC que bajo la orientacion del gran Partido, marcha con el poderio de autofortalecimiento acatando mas la linea de desarrollo paralelo.

articles.title: Inaugurado Campeonato Nacional
articles.content:
Inaugurado Campeonato Nacional
Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurado el Campeonato Nacional en Corea.
					  En el marco del campeonato, se realizaran en los estadios y gimnasios de Pyongyang, Phyongsong, Sariwon y otras localidades las competencias de mas de 470 disciplinas detalladas de 37 deportes como futbol, baloncesto, voleibol, judo, boxeo, atletismo y patinaje artistico.
					
					  Tuvo lugar el dia 2 en el Centro de Baloncesto del capitalino Reparto Chongchun la ceremonia inaugural.
					
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y del CC del PTC y presidente del Comite Estatal de Direccion de Deportes, el vicepremier Jon Kwang Ho y otros funcionarios interesados, los deportistas y los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					  El ministro de Deportes, Kim Il Guk, dijo en su discurso inaugural que el presente campeonato sera una oportunidad para manifestar la invariable conviccion y voluntad del pueblo y los deportistas coreanos que aun en medio de las inauditas maniobras de aislamiento y aplastamiento anti-RPDC de los imperialistas yanquis y las fuerzas satelites, construyen la potencia civilizada socialista bajo la direccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un glorificando las hazanas inmortales del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il acumuladas por el desarrollo de deportes del pais.

articles.title: Inaugurada exposicion nacional de exitos cientifico-tecnicos del deporte
articles.content:
Inaugurada exposicion nacional de exitos cientifico-tecnicos del deporte
Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada la 21a  exposicion nacional de exitos cientifico-tecnicos del deporte.
					En el certamen estan exhibidos mas de 1200 resultados cientifico-tecnicos tales como los programas de deporte, los aparatos de medicion, los medicamentos, los tonificantes, los equipos y aparatos deportivos, los libros y las disertaciones presentados por las unidades del sector deportivo y de las ramas de educacion y ciencia y tecnica, inclusive el Ministerio de Deportes, el Comite de Taekwondo de Corea, el Comite de Educacion, la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, los conjuntos deportivos y las escuelas deportivas de jovenes y ninos escolares a lo largo del pais. 
					
					La ceremonia inaugural tuvo lugar hoy en el Palacio de Ciencias y Tecnicas con la participacion de Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y del CC del PTC y presidente del Comite Estatal de Direccion de Deportes, el vicepremier Jon Kwang Ho, los funcionarios de ramas interesadas y del deporte y los trabajadores de las unidades exponentes. 
					
					En su discurso de la ocasion, el ministro de Deportes, Kim Il Guk, dijo que a traves de la exposicion, todos los participantes deben intercambiar ampliamente los exitos y experiencias y aplicarlos en practica a fin de mejorar y desarrollar a base de ciencia deportiva contemporanea todas las esferas del deporte asi como el entrenamiento, la competencia, la educacion fisica y la formacion de reservas. 
					
					La exposicion estara abierta hasta el dia 6.
